## Breadcrumbs

### Basic Usage 


```Python

from tensorpc.dock import (marker, mui)

class App:

    @marker.mark_create_layout
    def my_layout(self):
        return mui.VBox([
            mui.Breadcrumbs(["Home", "Products", "Product 1"]).prop(
                muiColor="inherit", underline="hover"
            )
        ])


```
